title: Inconsistency with federal laws
context: [ยง477E-6] Inconsistency with federal laws. No creditor shall be required to comply with any provisions of this chapter that are directly inconsistent with federal laws relating to discrimination in the advancement of credit. A provision of this chapter is not directly inconsistent with federal laws if it provides greater protection to an applicant. [L 1975, c 109, pt of ยง1]
